msg: - New test case for writing 8-bit characters to Unicode property.

author: klute
msg: - Fix: HPSF now ensures that string properties are always written with the type Variant.VT_LPWSTR instead of Variant.VT_LPSTR if the codepage is 1200 (Unicode).
- Codepage numbers aggregated in the new class org.apache.poi.hpsf.Constants.

author: klute
msg: - Important fix to actually place the property into the property set.
